description: Artists and activists in Greece are bringing racist violence out of the shadows - by illustrating it.
title: Greek artists fight race violence with a digital map
title_page: Greek artists fight race violence with a digital map - BBC News
maintext: "We want to make everyone understand that in the streets where we walk, talk, kiss and embrace, there was once bloodshed." Many victims do not have papers and fear being deported if they report attacks, she adds.
